text: @realDonaldTrump Stop trying to play the Coronavirus down. You think we feel safe with Pence?  He was stupid enough to say smoking did not kill people and you think he can handle a pandemic? You were more STUPID to fire the pandemic specialists back when and stupid to say we could hire Doctors!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
